summary:
### **Investment Update Summary – WAM Alternative Assets (ASX: WMA)**  

#### **Key Financials**  
- **NTA per share (pre-tax, June 2025)**: **117.30c** (May 2025: 117.31c)  
- **June 2025 share price**: **$0.955**  
- **Dividend Yield**:  
  - **Annualised fully franked interim yield**: **5.7%**  
  - **Grossed-up yield (incl. franking credits)**: **8.1%**  
  - **Dividends paid since Oct 2020**: **14.2c** (27.1c incl. franking credits)  
- **Investment portfolio performance (pa since Oct 2020)**: **8.9%** (pre-expenses/fees/taxes)  

#### **Portfolio & Strategy**  
- **Capital commitments**: **19.0% of portfolio** (pending deployment)  
- **Major acquisition**: **$200M life sciences campus (5-11 & 14 Julius Ave, North Ryde, Sydney)**  
  - **12,000 sqm CSIRO-leased lab space + 40,000 sqm developable land**  
  - Settlement expected **July 2025**  
- **Asset class exposure**:  
  - **Private equity (26.9%)**, **Water (15.5%)**, **Infrastructure (15.1%)**, **Real estate (11.3%)**, **Cash (19.9%)**  

#### **Material Developments**  
- **Sector focus**: Bullish on **life sciences real estate** (strong demand, long-duration leases).  
- **Co-investment opportunity**: Participation in **Wentworth Capital’s North Ryde acquisition** (similar to prior Pyrmont deal).  

**No material changes to capital structure or liquidity flagged.**  

*(Operational details and fund manager background omitted as non-material for trading decisions.)*
